title: Mathematics-Specific Foreign Language Vocabulary Expansion Projects Using Intelligent Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematical terminology, smartphone proficiency, and intermediate+ foreign language reading/writing ability
context.additional_context: Operated as evening/weekend courses for working professionals. Enhanced customized vocabulary learning utilizing real-life images captured by learners.

learning_goals: Learners can memorize five or more context-based specialized foreign-language math vocabulary items per week for 12 weeks using IUEcosystem
Learners can generate concept maps linking existing vocabulary knowledge to new vocabulary with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can achieve a vocabulary re-recognition rate of over 90% during the third review by responding to system-generated notifications

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
